# Caleb Kwon 

I am a second year PhD student in the [Technology and Operations Management Unit](https://www.hbs.edu/faculty/units/tom/Pages/default.aspx) within the Business School at Harvard University. My research interests are in Supply Chains, Retail Operations, and Econometrics. I am advised by Professor [Ananth Raman](https://www.hbs.edu/faculty/Pages/profile.aspx?facId=6534).

  - [Teaching evaluations for HBS Course: Technology and Operations Management (requred for all MBAs at HBS).](https://calebkwon.com/rctom_reviews)
  - [Estimation of the Number of Components in Nonparametric Multivariate Finite Mixture Models (2020)](https://www.dropbox.com/s/cxkmkbzp9b1azke/paper_draft_jun_2020.pdf?dl=0) *forthcoming* at the **Annals of Statistics**.
